name: Road Survivor
description:
Controls:

Use the direction buttons or WASD to move your car.

Description:

This is my first game on Itch.io, in this you need to survive 20s on a dangerous higway, be careful with the sides, try not to crash with other cars and finally arrive to your destiny. This game is maded mainly for the 20s GameJam but if you like feel free to show your support on comments!.
